The legatee could sue the testator's debtor by actio utilis, Cod 6. 37. 18, and could also claim an express assignment from the heres, Dig. 30. 44. 6. lt the debtor paid the heir, the latter could be compelled to transfer the amount so received to the legatee : il payment were made to the testator in his lifetime, the legacy became void unless the will clearly disclosed a contrary intention, Dig. 32. 11. 13, ib. 64.
